intro.title: An events directory for Castellón de la Plana
intro.description: Go Castellón helps residents and visitors quickly find what's happening in the city: concerts, exhibitions, meetups, festivals, sports, local events, and more. You submit an event — we review it and publish it in the directory.

who-its-for.title: Who it's for
items: Cafes, bars, and venues with recurring events (quizzes, talks, concerts)
Local communities (book clubs, language meetups, etc.)

items.label: Extra visibility
items.description: People discover your event in the directory and learn about your venue.

items.label: Publishing without hassle
items.description: You fill in the form — we handle the rest.

items.label: Pre-publication review
items.description: When needed, we lightly edit the text, standardize the format, and clarify details.

items.label: Accurate location
items.description: We verify the address and the map pin.

items.label: A shareable event page
items.description: A permanent link you can send to visitors.

steps.text: You submit an event via the form (takes a few minutes).
We review and publish it (moderation helps keep quality high and prevents spam).
The event appears in the directory and receives a permanent link.

what-to-include.title: What to include when submitting
what-to-include.subtitle: To get your event approved quickly:

items.label: Category
items.description: Helps people find events via filters

items.label: Date/time
items.description: And location (address or a clear description of where it is)

items.label: Description
items.description: What it is, who it's for, key details

items.label: Link
items.description: If available (website/social/tickets). If you don't have a link, that's fine.

moderation.title: Moderation and quality rules
moderation.description: We moderate submissions so the directory stays trustworthy and useful.
moderation.admin-rights: The admin reserves the right to:
admin-actions: Decline publication if an event doesn't meet the directory rules.
moderation.decline-reasons-intro: We typically ask for clarification or decline if:
decline-reasons: The information looks like spam or is misleading,
The content violates basic norms or the law.
moderation.decline-note: If an event is not published, we'll briefly explain why and what to fix.

pilot.title: Pilot mode
pilot.description: The project is currently running as a local pilot. We're improving Go Castellón together with local venues and institutions. If you have a recurring program (e.g., tours/exhibitions/series), we can agree on a convenient way to share events.

contact.description: Want to add an event or join as a venue?
contact.cta: Submit your first event via the form — we'll follow up if anything needs clarification.
